state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, you could, like, go to the north. After that, try to go west. And then, try to go west. After that, travel west. And then, make an effort to travel south. That done, go to the south. And then, attempt to travel west. That done, attempt to travel north. Once you accomplish that, make an effort to go north. That done, try to venture north. Then, head east. After that, make an attempt to venture east. Then, make an attempt to travel north. With that done, lift the latchkey from the floor of the spare room. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Scullery =- Of every scullery you could have sauntered into, you had to walk into an ordinary one. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Scullery =-0/1
next_state: -= Sauna =- Guess what, you are in a place we're calling a sauna. You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a drawer. You can make out a safe. There is an open gateway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Sauna =-0/2
